title: JSON Schema implementation
description: Metadata about an individual implementation of JSON Schema supported by Bowtie.

language.description: The implementation language (e.g. C++, Python, etc.)

name.description: The name of the implementation itself

dialects.description: A list of JSON Schema dialects (URIs) which the implementation understands. When running test cases, this list will be consulted before sending them to the implementation (and any unsupported dialects will be skipped).

documentation.description: A URL for the implementation's documentation

homepage.description: A URL for the implementation's homepage

issues.description: A URL for the implementation's bug tracker

source.description: A URL where the implementation's source code is hosted

links.description: Additional web page links relevant to the implementation

os.description: Operating system the implementation is running on

os_version.description: Version of OS the implementation is running on

language_version.description: Version of language used to run the implementation
